news.title: AMD is down 9% after reporting earnings. Here's why
news.summary: The chipmaker's stock has surged over the past year amid the AI boom. The company's stock is up more than 50% in the past 12 months.

news.title: Fed pick: Tillis doubles down on Warsh blockade over concerns about Fed independence
news.summary: Sen. Thom Tillis says he is committed to blocking Kevin Warsh's confirmation as Fed chair unless the Trump administration ends its probe of Chair Powell.

news.title: Private payrolls rose by just 22,000 in January, far short of expectations, ADP says
news.summary: The U.S. labor market barely budged in January, with hiring below even muted expectations. The U.N.'s World Employment Report for January was released on Friday. The report was released to coincide with World Employment Day.

news.title: Uber reports 20% revenue growth in fourth-quarter, fueled by food delivery
news.summary: Uber said revenue in its food delivery business increased 30%, beating analysts' estimates. Uber: Revenue in our food deliveryBusiness increased 30% to $1.2 billion.

news.title: Eli Lilly blows past quarterly estimates, posts strong outlook as Zepbound and Mounjaro sales soar
news.summary: Eli Lilly's guidance comes in stark contrast to the outlook of Novo Nordisk, which warned it sees sales and profit declining as much as 13% this year.

news.title: Another missile maker partners with the Trump administration, and the stock rises to record heights
news.summary: Raytheon announces five agreements with the Pentagon to boost capacity and deliveries of Tomahawk and interceptor missiles. RTX’s Raytheon unit announced five agreements.

news.title: ADP jobs report shows paltry 22,000 increase in private hiring. Sluggish labor market not getting any better.
news.summary: Job creation has plummeted since trade wars and immigration crackdown, study finds. Job creation has been plummeting since trade Wars and immigration Crackdown, study says.

news.title: Investors were braced for AI fallout — just not this one, popular strategist says.
news.summary: Nomura’s Charlie McElligott says second-order AI disruption worries have arrived early. Investors need to get ready.

news.title: There’s an ‘elevated chance of weird things’ as volatility rises along with this hot stock market
news.summary: In South Korea, its version of the VIX volatility index has soared along with its stock market. That’s unusual. In the U.S., the index has been more volatile.

news.title: ‘This is our second marriage’: We’re in our 60s. How do we split expenses if we move in together and rent one house?
news.summary: “We have been taking turns living in his house and my house,” he says. “We’ve been taking it in turns to stay in each other’s homes.”
